meanings.definition: A famous beach in Honolulu, Hawaii.
meanings.sent1: Many people visit Wakiki to enjoy the sun and sand.
meanings.sent2: The hotels near Wakiki offer beautiful views of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls at Wakiki seem to love the beach as much as the tourists do.
meanings.sent4: The waves at Wakiki crash against the shore with a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The palm trees sway gently in the breeze at Wakiki.

meanings.definition: A popular tourist destination known for its surfing and nightlife.
meanings.sent1: Surfers from around the world come to ride the waves at Wakiki.
meanings.sent2: The restaurants in Wakiki stay open late to cater to the nightlife crowd.
meanings.sent3: The music at the clubs in Wakiki keeps the party going all night long.
meanings.sent4: The energy in Wakiki is contagious, drawing visitors back year after year.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and chatter fill the streets of Wakiki every evening.

meanings.sent1: The locals in Hawaii often use the term 'wakiki' to describe the ocean's beauty.
meanings.sent2: The legend of the wakiki tells of a magical fountain that grants wishes.
meanings.sent3: If you listen closely, you can hear the whispers of the wakiki in the waves.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering reflections on the water resemble the wakiki's spouting waters.
meanings.sent5: The children playfully pretend to summon the wakiki with their laughter.
